description: These vegan panini sandwiches are stuffed with balsamic glazed veggies and a creamy sun-dried tomato hummus.
keywords: Hummus Panini, Vegan Balsamic Veggie & Sun-Dried Tomato Hummus Panini, Vegan Panini, vegan panini sandwiches
name: Vegan Balsamic Veggie & Sun-Dried Tomato Hummus Panini
recipeIngredient: 15 ounce 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 cup chopped sun-dried tomatoes (not oil packed)
1 medium red bell pepper (sliced into strips)
8 slices vegan sandwich bread (multigrain works well here)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chickpeas, olive oil, lemon juice, tahini, and garlic into the bowl of a food processor fitted with an S-blade. Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed. You can thin the mixture with 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed, but you'll want to keep it relatively think so it works to bind the sandwich. Add in the sun-dried tomatoes and pulse until they're finely chopped. Season with salt to taste.
